subtitle: For a deliciously different entertaining menu or party dish, try this very simple and quick to prepare fondue.

method.text: In a fondue or saucepan, melt the margarine. Add the bacon and garlic and cook for 2-3 min. Stir in the celery and cook for 2 min.
Pour in wine, mustard and cheese. Cook very gently for 8-10 min until cheese has melted.
Blend cornflour with water and add to fondue.
Bring to the boil, stirring constantly, and simmer uncovered for 2-3 min until thickened.

title: Bacon, cheese and celery fondue
